posts.post_content:
Well here goes.  I have had many people ask about my Carolina Brights T206 cards and after a little thought and research I am going to throw this out here and see how it goes.  

What's my crazy number some of you may have asked?  How about these 11 T206's for $10,000.  From what I've seen and what has been graded by PSA, this has to be one of the better Carolina Bright collections around.  This would be a real nice addition to anyone's collection.

Keep in mind, this is my buy it now and end the drama price for me.  I'll let it go out there for a bit.  I really don't want to sell them but I figure I can give it a go.

This lot includes:

Bill Abstein PSA 4  1 of 2 graded by PSA both 4's
Bill Clymer PSA 3.5 1 of 4 graded by PSA 2nd highest
Fred Burchell PSA 3 1 of 4 graded by PSA 
Jap Barbeau PSA 3 1 of 4 graded by PSA
Jean Dubuc PSA 3 1 of 2 the highest graded by PSA
Billy Nattess PSA 3 1 of 1 
Paul Davidson PSA 2 1 of 2 higest graded by PSA
Deacon Phillippe PSA 2 1 of 2 graded by PSA
Tom Downey PSA 2 1 of 1 graded by PSA
Red Murray PSA 1.5 1 of 1 graded by PSA
Billy Campbell PSA 1 1 of 3 graded by PSA

Shoot me a PM if you're interested.

Thanks

A
High bid right now is $6000.  Anyone want to up the ante?
With almost half the cards being psa 2 or less, i would take the offer of $6k I believe.
6K?   Have you seen the stock market the past 2 days?  Hit that bid before they make it immediate or cancel.!!!!!!!

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=1051129]6K?   Have you seen the stock market the past 2 days?  Hit that bid before they make it immediate or cancel.!!!!!!![/QUOTE]

LOL after an over 10% runup? :rolleyes: 


I would take that bid though.. 6k is nice for 11 of them.
If you sold them privately, you would have more in your pocket & the buyer might be able to get a better deal. Just a thought.
You took the best card out of the lot...Chase.  6k?  take it.
